summary: Test suite that uses Moto to mock AWS and validates the creation of Kinesis Firehose delivery streams configured for various destination types such as Elasticsearch, extended S3, HTTP, Redshift, and Snowflake.
business_intent: Confirm that Firehose delivery streams can be programmatically set up with different target services and that the configuration parameters are correctly applied, ensuring reliable data pipelines across multiple storage and analytics platforms.
